question: Not sure what your Virginia's Insurance Marketplacee insurance covers in regards to COVID-19?
text:
Not sure what your Virginia's Insurance Marketplacee insurance covers in regards to COVID-19?
          
        
All Qualified Health Plans (QHP) that you can purchase through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace are required to cover the testing, diagnosis, and treatment of COVID-19, as well as all FDA-approved vaccines.
Contact your health insurance provider today for more information about what your insurance covers regarding COVID-19 and all of your other healthcare needs.
